name: Dan-bi
description:
Dan-bi is a 3D third-person adventure game developed by Team 81 Scales, inspired by the Korean mythological creature called “Imoogi”. Follow Yeon and Moogi the Imoogi on a journey to find the Dragon, who will guide them to Moogi’s ascension, and finally bring the much-needed rain to the Miru village.

Story

Two years after the sixteenth-century Japanese invasion, a drought hits the rural Korean village of "Miru", where a little girl named Yeon lives with her grandparents. Yeon’s Grandpa tells her about the legend of the Dragon. According to the legend, if a human asks a Dragon very nicely for rain, it will bring rain clouds. Grandpa says he knows that Dragons live in rivers or places with a lot of water. 

Yeon knows a place like this and travels there, but she finds an Imoogi and mistakes him for the Dragon. Out of pity, the Imoogi informs her of the mistake and offers to take her to the Dragon.

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Sprint - Shift
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Rotate Camera - QE
  • ESC - Pause
  • Power - 1~3
  • Switch Active Power - 4
  • Cloud+Power Combo - 1+3
